action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the apple in the cupboard, the book in the wardrobe and the broom in the freezer.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
> open freezer
Turn 1
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.
> look around
Turn 2
I don't know how to interpret this 'look' action.
> go to kitchen
Turn 3
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
> open cupboard
Turn 4
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
> take plate
Turn 5
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
> go to living room
Turn 6
You are in a living room now. There are a book, a side table, a couch, a chair, a table and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.
> take book
Turn 7
You take the book. In your inventory you have a plate and a book.
> drop plate
Turn 8
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
> go to hallway
Turn 9
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom and a broom closet here.
> go to bedroom
Turn 10
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
> open wardrobe
Turn 11
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.
> put book in wardrobe
Turn 12
You put the book in the wardrobe.
> go to broom closet
Turn 13
You can't go to a broom closet from here.

> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
Turn 14
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom and a broom closet here.
> go to broom closet
Turn 15
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
> take broom
Turn 16
You take the broom. In your inventory you have a plate and a broom.
> drop plate
Turn 17
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
